snippet: The department’s Rewards for Justice program is offering up to $7 million for information leading to the whereabouts of four Islamic State leaders.
abstract: State Dept announces rewards of up to $7 million for information leading to whereabouts of four Islamic State leaders.
lead_paragraph: The department’s Rewards for Justice program is offering up to $7 million for information leading to the whereabouts of four Islamic State leaders.

headline.main: U.S. Offers Millions in Rewards for Information on ISIS Leaders
